name: Pizza Margherita
description: A timeless classic. This traditional pizza features a rich tomato sauce base, creamy mozzarella cheese, and a sprinkle of fresh, aromatic basil.

name: Pepperoni Pizza
description: A fan favorite! This pizza is generously topped with spicy pepperoni slices over a classic tomato sauce and melted mozzarella cheese.

name: Carbonara Pasta
description: An authentic Roman delight. Al dente pasta tossed in a creamy sauce made from fresh eggs, savory guanciale, sharp Pecorino cheese, and a kick of freshly ground black pepper.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce tossed with crunchy garlic croutons, savory Parmesan cheese, and our signature creamy Caesar dressing. A perfect light meal or starter.

name: Classic Burger
description: The all-American classic. A juicy beef patty topped with melted cheddar cheese, crisp lettuce, fresh tomato, and onions, served with a side of golden French fries.

name: Tiramisu
description: A heavenly Italian classic. Layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and rich, creamy mascarpone, dusted with a fine layer of cocoa powder.

name: Mineral Water
description: Pure and refreshing mineral water, sourced from natural springs. Available as either still or sparkling to quench your thirst.

name: Coca-Cola
description: The iconic and refreshing sparkling soft drink, served chilled for your enjoyment.

name: 4 Seasons Pizza
description: A pizza for all tastes, representing the four seasons. Topped with savory artichokes, cooked ham, fresh mushrooms, and black olives.

name: Grilled Salmon
description: A healthy and delicious choice. A tender salmon fillet grilled to perfection, served with a medley of fresh, roasted seasonal vegetables.

name: Tomato Bruschetta
description: A vibrant and fresh appetizer. Toasted artisan bread rubbed with garlic, topped with a delicious mix of diced fresh tomatoes, basil, and a drizzle of olive oil.

name: Chocolate Mousse
description: A rich and airy delight for chocolate lovers. This light mousse is made from decadent dark chocolate, offering a perfect, indulgent end to your meal.

name: Bolognese Pasta
description: A comforting and hearty classic. Your choice of pasta served with a slow-simmered, rich tomato and minced meat sauce.

name: Espresso Coffee
description: The perfect pick-me-up. A short, strong, and intense shot of freshly brewed coffee with a rich crema.

name: Lemon Meringue Pie
description: A zesty and sweet masterpiece. A buttery shortcrust pastry filled with tangy lemon cream and topped with a fluffy, sweet meringue.

name: Onion Soup
description: A warming French classic. Rich, slow-cooked onion soup, topped with a crusty piece of bread and melted, bubbly cheese.

name: Steak Frites
description: The ultimate bistro meal. A succulent grilled ribeye steak cooked to your liking, served with a side of crispy French fries and a savory pepper sauce.

name: Fresh Squeezed Orange Juice
description: Pure, natural refreshment. 100% juice from freshly squeezed oranges, with no added sugar. The perfect start to your day.

name: Vegetarian Burger
description: A delicious meat-free option. A savory vegetable patty topped with creamy avocado, crisp lettuce, and fresh tomato, served on a toasted bun.

name: Crème Brûlée
description: An elegant and decadent dessert. A rich, creamy vanilla custard base topped with a contrasting layer of hard, crunchy caramelized sugar.
